item.description:
The temperature is expected to be in the 80s, so this is a great time to begin the outdoor happy hours Lisa introduced us to last summer. Also, Leo, our resident idea(l) man, says it is time to head up to the roof.

If you want a spot, 'where the air is fresh and sweet', get there early because the roofdeck will most likely reach its capacity of fifty before 6:00 PM. You can also checkout the second floor for pool or hang out on the first floor for conversation.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5 and hang until 7.....unless????

Be prepared to be flattered.....you'll be carded as you enter, so have your identification ready.

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

Check out this link, http://rattlesnakebar... to see the Tasting dinner menu by Brian Poe, Rattlesnake's resident chef.

Check out this link for the Rattlesnake beverage menu, http://rattlesnakebar...

Checkout this link for the Rattlesnake food menu, http://rattlesnakebar...

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Arlington (green line) is closest, less than (five (5) minute walk) subway station. Chinatown (orange line) subway station is less than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
